Articles.Content:
Yes, although I know that a floating point error summoned the Kraken.

(That was a case of dividing by 0)

The user below me has completed the Jool-5.

Nope, and I tried a couple of times. Now that Ziv's taking a break from judging it I may never do it.

The user below me doesn't use spaceplanes.

False, I definitely use them. My main Minmus service vehicle is a spaceplane.

The user below has written a blog.

Well, I tried once.

The user below and myself have done something during out attempt at Jool-5 that got the rules changed.

False, I haven't done that challenge, yet.

The user below me doesn't know how venus flytraps reproduce, and thus googled it after reading this sentence.

True...

The user below me hasn't landed on Pol.

Alternis Kerbol counts, right?

The user below me remembers Alternis Kerbol.

True but i haven't played in it.

The user below me has a head!

Yes? How did you know! This is amazing. Nobody ever pointed out I had a head before!

User below has made a mod for KSP.

Not yet...

The user below me frequents the local grocery store.

Nope.

User below me has banana as his/her SI unit of measurement.

No. I am sorry to dissapoint you.

THe user below used an SRB only rocket to go to Eve and back.

Through the power of the Debug Menu, yes.

The user below me understands logarithms, but doesn't know what to do with them

Scary that you know.

The user below me can't remember Pythagoras' theorem.

False, math & geometry were the exact subjects i (strangely) haven't failed at

The user below me isn't a cheese-burglar.

Correct. (funnily I have a friend with that nickname)

The user below has built an SSTO with lights on the landing gear, without knowing that there are inbuilt lights in the landing gear.

False. I forget that the gear have lights, but I don't do that on SSTOs due to the fact that I never o_Oing make SSTOs.

The user below me has a girlfriend.

Nope, my wife won't let me have one.

The user below me has a boyfriend.

Nope.

The user below me has a friend in me.

Ummmmm....Maybe?

The user below me is not from the same country I am.

True, Since I def dont live in Kerbedonia, MI

TUBM uses mods, lots of them

Ooops replied to wrong.

i just finished my install today. According to CKAN I have 77 mods installed.

I installed a few more manually.

No, not at all! I have barely any mods. /sarcasm

THe user below me built a tank.

Edited February 7, 2015 by Aerolfos

Does this count?

The user below me has a song stuck in his or her head.
The user below me now has this song stuck in his/her head.

I am resistant to such mortal things.

The user below me jsut designed a new fighter jet/bomber jet thing
